content.prompt:
Museum Expedition 1922, Robert B. Woodward Memorial Fund

The stool shown can be attributed to Ashanti culture based on

choices.label: its modular base and removable supports
its opposition between angular and curvilinear forms
its flat base, curved seat, and bilateral balance

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Justify an attribution of a work of art by explaining similarities with work by a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
